info.ephyra.trec
Class TRECTarget

java.lang.Object
  info.ephyra.trec.TRECTarget

public class TRECTarget
extends java.lang.Object

A TRECTarget is a simple data structure consisting of the ID of the target, the target description, possible target types and a list of questions.

Version:
2006-07-09
Author:
Nico Schlaefer

Field Summary
